item.title: Fantasy Romance Anthology Details
item.description: Fantasy Romance Anthology Submission Details Cover Art Minor changes may be made in the final version Deadline: August 31st, 2022 Publication: Early 2023 (most likely in February) Word limit: 25,000 words Theme: We are accepting all fantasy romance stories, including those with dark elements and spicy scenes. The cover has been provided to offer inspiration and the general vibe of the anthology; however all cover elements do not need to be included in your story, i.
